findings.message:
Reentrancy in SodaVault.burnByPool(address,uint256) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1063-1073):
	External calls:
	- _withdraw(_amount) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1069)
		- strategies[i].withdraw(address(this),_amount) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1151)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _burn(_account,_amount) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1071)
		- _balances[account] = _balances[account].sub(amount,ERC20: burn amount exceeds balance) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#785)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

	- _transfer(_from,_to,_amount) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1085)
		- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#745)
		- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#746)

findings.message:
Reentrancy in SodaVault.burnByPool(address,uint256) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1063-1073):
	External calls:
	- _withdraw(_amount) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1069)
		- strategies[i].withdraw(address(this),_amount) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1151)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _burn(_account,_amount) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1071)
		- _totalSupply = _totalSupply.sub(amount) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#786)
	- _updateDebt(_account) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1072)
		- debts[_who][i] = balance.mul(value).div(PER_SHARE_SIZE) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1176)
	- _updateReward(_account) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1070)
		- rewards[_who][i] = rewards[_who][i].add(balance.mul(value).div(PER_SHARE_SIZE).sub(debts[_who][i])) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1166-1167)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:

	External calls:
	- pool.vault.mintByPool(msg.sender,0) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1259)
	- _handleRewards(pool.vault) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1260)
		- returndata = address(token).functionCall(data,SafeERC20: low-level call failed) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#441)
		- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#359)
		- IERC20(_vault.strategies(i).getTargetToken()).safeTransferFrom(address(_vault.strategies(i)),msg.sender,rewardPending) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1234-1235)
		- _vault.clearRewardByPool(msg.sender) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1239)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _handleRewards(pool.vault) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1260)
		- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#359)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Claim(msg.sender,_poolId) (../..0x74bcb8b78996f49f46497be185174b2a89191fd6.sol#1262)
findings.name: reentrancy-events
